title: Mutually Exclusive Events
text: The events “drawing a heart” and “drawing a spade” are mutually exclusive because they cannot occur at the same time.
speech: The events “drawing a heart” and “drawing a spade” are mutually exclusive because they cannot occur at the same time.
pacedSpeech: The events “drawing a heart” and “drawing a spade” are mutually exclusive because they cannot occur at the same time.

title: Drawing a Heart
text: The probability of drawing a heart is $$\frac{1}{4}$$
speech: The probability of drawing a heart is  1 fourth
pacedSpeech: The probability of drawing a heart is   1 fourth

title: Drawing a Spade
text: the probability of drawing a spade is also $$\frac{1}{4}$$
speech: the probability of drawing a spade is also  1 fourth
pacedSpeech: the probability of drawing a spade is also   1 fourth

title: Addition
text: Add the probability of drawing a heart with the probability of drawing a spade.
speech: Add the probability of drawing a heart with the probability of drawing a spade.
pacedSpeech: Add the probability of drawing a heart with the probability of drawing a spade.
